    Setup and Use the Addins

    V03_addins.Rmd

    {flow} provides a pair of addins so you can run flow_view() or flow_run() on your selection.

    The flow_view() addin will figure out if the selection is a path, the symbol of a function, or code. The flow_run should be used on calls only.

    addins

    Developed by Antoine Fabri.

    Site built with pkgdown 1.5.1.
